caption.title: Results of Models 1a and 1b: Linear (blue shaded area) and exponential (green shaded area) relationships between NDVI (x-axis) and R s (y-axis).
caption.p:
R
s values range from 0.36 to 1.90 for the linear model, and 0.52 to 2.19 for the exponential model; for NDVI values varying between 0.59 and 0.85.
Click here for additional data file.
